purpose: The email announces a tenure track position for an Associate Senior Lecturer in AI for Software Engineering at Blekinge Institute of Technology in Karlskrona, Sweden. It outlines the responsibilities of the position, which include research, teaching, and supervision in software engineering, with a focus on using and developing AI to enhance software development processes. The email specifies the qualifications required for applicants, including a doctoral degree or equivalent scientific competence, and notes that preference will be given to those who completed their degree within the last five years. The application deadline is set for August 1, 2025.

evidence_sentences: ASSOCIATE SENIOR LECTURER (TENURE TRACK) in AI for SOFTWARE ENGINEERING
The employment includes research, teaching, and supervision in software engineering.
The focus of the research will be on using and developing (generative) AI to improve software development processes as well as the quality of software artefacts (e.g., code or designs).
Eligible to be employed as an associate senior lecturer is a person who has completed a doctoral degree or has equivalent scientific competence.
